title: Workshop on Pen-Based Technology Utilization for Computer Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Core computer science knowledge and university-level programming experience
context.additional_context: Exploration of pedagogical applications of Pen-Based Technologies (PBTs) through concept map-based instructional strategies in environments where digital devices (e.g., tablet PCs) are provided.

learning_goals: Participants can design concept maps using pen-based technology to structure computer science education content.
Participants can create dynamic learning environments through interactive problem-solving activities using digital ink.
Participants can analyze the educational functions of tablet PCs and digital pens and apply them to their own lecture designs.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
